```{r}
#Question 3
my_matrix <- function(x=2, y=3){ 
m <- matrix(nrow = x,ncol = y)

for (i in 1:x) {
 for (j in 1:y) {
  m[i,j] <- (i * j)
 }
}
  return(m)
} 

my_matrix()
```
